57628.<voice 03850_00057628><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03850_00057628><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>……我们果然是已经死了。<stop_lip_animation n02046 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57630.<voice 04085_00057630><start_lip_sync n0:

57631.<voice 04135_00057631><start_lip_sync n0:

57634.<voice 04985_00057634><start_lip_sync n0:
